hero.title: Front-End Developer
hero.desc: I build purposeful interfaces — accessible, intuitive, and made for real people.

about.title: About
about.text: Hi! I'm Murilo, a front-end developer focused on creating accessible, intuitive digital experiences that make a difference. I love working on challenging projects that allow me to learn and explore the potential of ever-evolving web technologies. I'm always looking for better and more inclusive solutions to everyday challenges, with a strong focus on the user and code quality.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.portfolioDesc: Portfolio built with React + Vite, styled with Tailwind, and featuring multi-language support using i18n.

projectLibrary.title: Library
projectLibrary.libraryDesc: Project built with React + Vite, styled with Tailwind. It consists of a website with authentication, where you can rent books.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: At the moment, I'm looking for full-time opportunities as a front-end developer. If you liked what you saw or have any questions, suggestions, or just want to chat, feel free to get in touch. My inbox is always open, and I'll do my best to respond as soon as possible.
